snippet.title: Mecha BREAK - Official Mecha Design Concept Trailer
snippet.description:
The latest Mecha BREAK trailer showcases gorgeous mecha featuring designs by mech artists Takayuki Yanase (Metal Gear, Gundam, Armored Core, Death Stranding) and Junya Ishigaki (Xenogears, Gundam, Macross), who worked on some of the mechs for the upcoming action game. The trailer also reveals a summer closed beta test for Mecha BREAK is coming in August 2024. Mecha BREAK will be available on PC, Xbox Series X/S, and PS5.

#IGN #Gaming #Mecha
